title: New: The Pale White – That Dress
body:
_That Dress_ (no, not [The Dress](https://en.

wikipedia.org/wiki/The_dress)), the latest track from North East trio **The Pale White**, is another huge signal of intent. All based around a swaggering Queens of the Stoneage-esque riff, already a staple of their electrifying live set, it’s further indication of just how far this group are likely to go. Check it out below. The Pale White play a sold out headline show at Think Tank, Newcastle, on Friday 30 September.
